com.m3rcuriel.controve.components

Interface AngleSensor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReZeroable

    public interface AngleSensor
extends ReZeroable
    An interface representation of a sensor measuring angular position.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default double computeAngleChangeTo(double targetAngle, double tolerance)
      Find the difference between the current location and the target angle within a tolerance.
      static AngleSensor create(java.util.function.DoubleSupplier angleSupplier)
      Construct a new AngleSensor based on a DoubleSupplier.
      double getAngle()
      Get the current measured angle position of the sensor.
      static AngleSensor invert(AngleSensor sensor)
      Invert a given AngleSensor instance.
      default AngleSensor zero()
      Zero the sensor.

    • Method Detail

      • getAngle

        double getAngle()
        Get the current measured angle position of the sensor.
        Returns:
        the current angular position in degrees

      • computeAngleChangeTo

        default double computeAngleChangeTo(double targetAngle,
                                    double tolerance)
        Find the difference between the current location and the target angle within a tolerance.
        Parameters:
        targetAngle - the goal angle
        tolerance - the tolerance to consider "at" the goal
        Returns:
        the difference between the target and the goal; 0 if within tolerance

      • zero

        default AngleSensor zero()
        Zero the sensor.
        Specified by:
        zero in interface ReZeroable
        Returns:
        the newly zeroed AngleSensor.

      • create

        static AngleSensor create(java.util.function.DoubleSupplier angleSupplier)
        Construct a new AngleSensor based on a DoubleSupplier.
        Parameters:
        angleSupplier - the supplier method for the sensor
        Returns:
        the new AngleSensor

      • invert

        static AngleSensor invert(AngleSensor sensor)
        Invert a given AngleSensor instance.
        Parameters:
        sensor - the sensor to invert
        Returns:
        the inverted sensor
